ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Bard% was (Patch message)
ygData.msgSnippet: Charismatic Carillion is EXTREMELY useful, the song I was citing though (level 60) is a group cha buff, which is worthless. (ya ya, you can get better prices
ygData.messageBody:
Charismatic Carillion is EXTREMELY useful, the song I was citing though
(level 60) is a group cha buff, which is worthless. (ya ya, you can get
better prices at vendors. Still worthless)

-----Original Message-----
From: Cyr, Thierry [mailto:thierry.cyr@...]
Sent: Tuesday, February 27, 2001 1:23 PM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Bard% was (Patch message)


uh xcuse me but the charisma song is usefull every now and then. For
instance going from threatening to dubious. DDD well i've played it once and
flipped when i saw my mana go oom. Ervaj i have yet to play except for
raising brass skill (oooh look at those pretty colors)

Minkin

-----Original Message-----
From: Adam Wasserman [mailto:wassermana@...]
Sent: February 27, 2001 1:14 PM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Bard% was (Patch message)


ANY bard that is wasting a song slot to sing this should be booted. Get a
cold stone, get a DE mask (I know level 3 bards with this), get a glowing
stone band, get a caster to cast ultra vision on you. WHATEVER. This song is
useless, and to try to justify it by saying that there are a few select uses
for it is being argumentative.

This song rates up there with Denon's Desperate Dirge, Melody of Ervaj and
Solon's Charismatic Concord.

Draelon Stormsong
Troubador of Karana
Tribunal Server

-----Original Message-----
From: Jeffrey Sue [mailto:jsue@...]
Sent: Tuesday, February 27, 2001 1:20 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Bard% was (Patch message)


At 12:59 PM 2/27/01 -0500, you wrote:
>i have never used concord once. never. it is useless.

that would have been a correct statement if you had added ''to me'' at the
end of ''it is useless''. if you were a human bard without a dark elf mask,
i believe you would find it very useful.
